**9. Carson Lambos, LHD, Winnipeg ICE (WHL)**
```{r echo=FALSE }
htmltools::includeHTML("C:\\Users\\ellis\\Desktop\\site-draftlook\\Cards\\CLambos.html")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(eeptools)
library(janitor)
library(sjmisc)
library(linguisticsdown)

url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15LQi8UZ41jR6bq6MLIGyjRSagLMigFaDl0hgeH2UpWc/edit?usp=sharing"
info <- rio::import(file = url,which = 2)
info <- clean_names(info)

info <- mutate_all(info, funs(str_replace(., "â€™", "'")))

info <- subset(info, player_name == "Carson Lambos")
```
